title: Curvo Labs Raises $2M in Series A Funding
text:
Curvo Labs, Inc., an Evansville, IND.-based healthcare supply chain and sourcing technology company, closes its $2m Series A funding round.

The round was led by Snake Run Capital and Elevate Ventures. In conjunction with the funding, Kent Parker, Founder and President of Snake Run Capital will begin serving as Curvo’s Board Chair.

The company intends to use the funds to expand the leadership team and further develop the product offering.

Founded in 2013 by Andy Perry and Steve Suhrheinrich, Curvo offers a Software-as-a-Service technology platform for strategic clinical spend management that equips hospital supply chain leaders and CFOs with the ability to reduce costs while maintaining quality.

The company has seen revenue growth of over 5X since its last funding round in 2017.
